channel.title: DemonScape
channel.description:
Hello, I am looking to start a decent private server (317) with programmers, graphics creators of any type, level, etc (obviously web page creators, java programmers, etc). The server will be based on "BlazeScape" unless any of the team members suggest a better base (I am not starting a server on framework because that would be to time consuming).
So what I am looking for is:
[color=red]5 Java Programmers (server to client side): - - -
5 Helpers -pkerA - - - -
2 Configuration Editors (CFG Files) -pkerA -
1 Graphics Designer (possibly 2) -
1 Web Programmers (since I haven't really gone anywhere with this server we will be using SMF forums) -Amayzing
Two Administrators -Amayzing -Monty-
Four Moderators -shoveb1 -pkerA -whip of soulz -
To get in contact with me message me (speak proper english), or add me on Msn: Johnj98@hotmail.com Also I have purchased a 100 dollar visa credit card but unless there is any actual development I do not feel like wasting hard earned money.
Thank-you for reading -John

item.title: DemonScape
item.dc:creator: @John6 -John
item.description:
@John6 wrote:

TOMSCAPE BETA:

Why do you need Configuration Editors? You can just make a command.

How do commands have anything to do with configuration files?

pkerA:

Hey man i can be a Configuration Editor… I got 1 experience with that and you can set me on helpers on the server coders if that is possible… (Please set me on mod too) I wanna be a helper cuz i still got much to learn in the Server coding… (I can code most of the client if that is needed)

Ok your in. Add my Msn.

Read full topic
